overview:
## Discussion

This method dismisses a picker that you previously presented. When using this method to dismiss a picker, the picker does not call the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrinterPickerControllerDelegate/printerPickerControllerWillDismiss(_:)] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrinterPickerControllerDelegate/printerPickerControllerDidDismiss(_:)] methods of your delegate object.

User interactions with the picker can also dismiss the picker automatically. For example, if the user selects a printer or cancels the picker, the picker dismisses itself automatically. Use this method to dismiss a picker programmatically in response to other events in your app.

# dismiss(animated:)

**Instance Method**

Dismisses the picker.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func dismiss(animated: Bool)
```

## Parameters

- **animated**: [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to animate the dismissal of the picker or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] to remove it without animations.

## Discussion

This method dismisses a picker that you previously presented. When using this method to dismiss a picker, the picker does not call the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrinterPickerControllerDelegate/printerPickerControllerWillDismiss(_:)] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrinterPickerControllerDelegate/printerPickerControllerDidDismiss(_:)] methods of your delegate object.

User interactions with the picker can also dismiss the picker automatically. For example, if the user selects a printer or cancels the picker, the picker dismisses itself automatically. Use this method to dismiss a picker programmatically in response to other events in your app.

## Presenting and dismissing the picker

- **present(animated:completionHandler:)**: Presents the picker from a view controller of your app.
- **present(from:animated:completionHandler:)**: Presents the picker in a popover that anchors to the specified bar button item.
- **present(from:in:animated:completionHandler:)**: Presents the picker in a popover that anchors to a rectangle in the specified view.
